Posts.Content: Okadam: While I'm not gay, I am single and date a couple of different women. So my concerns are very much the same as yours. I've pretty much decided on surgery. For me, it's the most reliable option to have the best chance of getting it all. I'll deal with the side effects as they come, BUT....I plan on being alive no matter what.
